name: Knowledge And Defense (V)
Lore: '''A Jedi uses the Force for knowledge and defense, never for attack.''',
Text: 'Deploy on table with up to 15 cards from outside your deck face-down under here. Four times per game, may play a Defensive Shield from here (as if from hand). Unless canceling your Interrupt, opponent may not play Recoil In Fear until the end of your first turn.(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
